7.6 The DATE module

decode-duration

Sealed method

Summary

Decodes a day/time duration into its constituent parts.

Signature

decode-duration duration 
=> days hours minutes seconds microseconds

Arguments

duration
An instance of <day/time-duration>.

Values

days
An instance of <integer>.

hours
An instance of <integer>.

minutes
An instance of <integer>.

seconds
An instance of <integer>.

microseconds
An instance of <integer>.

Library

system

Module

date

Description

Decodes an instance of <day/time-duration> into its constituent parts.

See also

decode-duration, page 145

decode-duration, page 146

encode-day/time-duration, page 149

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
